name: Mitigation Playbook for Application Layer Protocol Exploitation Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited an application layer protocol to exfiltrate sensitive data from the organization's internal network.

action--c3b8f5e7-6d8f-48a3-ba9e-f6c62a2e.name: Isolate affected host from the network
action--c3b8f5e7-6d8f-48a3-ba9e-f6c62a2e.description: Shut down the network interface of the affected host to prevent further data exfiltration.

parallel--eb48e525-401b-42ab-b20e-ae8502.name: Perform log analysis and deploy firewall rule
parallel--eb48e525-401b-42ab-b20e-ae8502.description: Analyze traffic logs for suspicious patterns and implement necessary firewall rules.

action--d7a2f63e-13e9-4a86-b7b5-3c63a183.name: Analyze traffic logs for suspicious patterns
action--d7a2f63e-13e9-4a86-b7b5-3c63a183.description: Search for any suspicious patterns in the traffic logs related to the affected host.

action--a23bc82d-d939-47f8-b999-f1b8b1c0.name: Deploy a web application firewall rule to block outbound connections
action--a23bc82d-d939-47f8-b999-f1b8b1c0.description: Set firewall rules to block connection attempts to the command-and-control server.
